original: HOLMBERG, Lars Fredrik Mattias, Civilingenjör, Stockholm, f Sthlm 25/11 08 av riks-bkskamr K J N H o Judit Lundqvist, gm Gunvor Schram. Ex tekn gymn Örebro 30, KTH (maskinbyggn o mek tekn) 30—34. Anst v AB Ljungströms Ångturbins beräkn.avd Sthlm 35 —36, SJ i Malmö 36—38, nu åter h AB Ljungströms Ångturbin Sthlm, assistent v KTH sed. 42. Led Sv Tekn.frn.
translated: HOLMBERG, Lars Fredrik Mattias, Civil Engineer, Stockholm, born in Stockholm on November 25, 1908, son of royal chamberlain K J N H and Judit Lundqvist, married to Gunvor Schram. Completed technical high school in Örebro in 1930, and attended the Royal Institute of Technology (specializing in mechanical engineering and mechanical technology) from 1930 to 1934. Employed at AB Ljungström's Steam Turbine Calculation Department in Stockholm from 1935 to 1936, at SJ in Malmö from 1936 to 1938, and is currently back at AB Ljungström's Steam Turbine in Stockholm. Assistant at the Royal Institute of Technology since 1942. A member of the Swedish Technical Association.

structured.name: Lars Fredrik Mattias Holmberg
structured.description: Civil Engineer and member of the Swedish Technical Association

career.workplace: AB Ljungström's Steam Turbine Calculation Department
